column1: Bronwes Folly is an Arnor ruin in Archet-Dale.The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
column3: The Ruins of Bree-land It was originally a fortress of Cardolan but in  it became infested by wolves.The Lord of the Rings Online
column4: Bree-land Introduction In the Bree-land Introduction Celandine Brandybuck asks the player to pick some Athelas flowers at the ruins to heal Amdir (Shadows of Angmar)s Morgul-knife-wound.The Lord of the Rings Online
column6: Intro: Remedy of the Old Kings
